author: PTI
title: U.S. wants to send team of experts inside China for COVID-19 probe: Trump
description: Describing the coronavirus as a plague, Mr. Trump, during his White House news conference on Sunday, said that he is not happy with China where the pandemic emerged in December last year in the central Chinese city of Wuhan.
content: The U.S. wants to send a team of experts to China to investigate coronavirus, President Donald Trump has said, a day after he warned Beijing of consequences if it was knowingly responsible for the spread of COVID-19 which has killed more than 165,000 people g… [+2078 chars]
